modName: White Lydia and No steel armor
summary: Changes Lydia hair to white, eyes to blue. Also removes her default armor so you can dress her as you want.
descriptionHtml:
Changes Lydia\'s hair to white and removes her steel armor.
This is my first. To install put the files in your data folder and activate the .esp file in your launcher. The first time you meet her she will be naked, or in her underwear( if you don\'t use nude mod). On the picture her weight is changed to 50 ( I\'m using the \"bouncing breasts mod\" and with it, her boobs are huge. I don\'t like it so i changed her weight to make it smaller). If needed i can upload that version too.
 I don\'t speak English well, hope you will understand
Oops one more thing, she is essential in this mod, or undying, or immortal... don\'t know the right word
author: FreddyKrueger
